name: Visual Novel Isekai Quartet The third Class
name_original: Visual Novel Isekai Quartet The third Class
description:
[Alpha version - Test phase of build]

This book is not made in RenPy but i recreate what i see on Y2b on Unity. It shall be for NanoReno but i will miss the deadline.

Alpha having only 2 Episode written down and implement, music, some noises. But i don't have any Voice actors.

If is anyone curios that making a Visual book from scratch take a loot a very loot more time that just write ordinary book from scratch.

-They are actually a class 2 not 1
